reviews.review: Игра хорошая, но попадаются много читеров на нонпрайме.
Só não gostei, por que fica travando
Das Spiel macht hammer viel Laune. Das einzige Problem ist eventuell, dass manchmal viele Hacker unterwegs sind. Aber das Prinzip 5vs5 oder 2vs2 oder Deathmatch. Für jeden ist etwas dabei..
It's fun although I am trash the community does help you out and getting a win feels so good
good game alot of toxic russians, watch out  dont go mad

As much as I hate this game, I just keep going back to it. It's really addicting, but it's really worth buying it, since the non prime edition is a piece of trash due to all the cheaters in every single game.
I have been playing it since 2015 and the game has been great so far but there are lots of Fucking scammers and cheaters. valve Need to improve the anti cheat of csgo

Bilmeyen yoktur herhalde Counter efsanesini. Oyun gayet güzel ;rekabetçi modu, basit eğlence, topluluk haritaları, tehlikeli bölge, yoldaş girebileceğimiz özellikle arkadaşlar ile sıkılmadan oynanabilecek bir oyun bilmeyen yoktur zaten o yüzden fazla uzun yazmaya gerek yok.Yolunuz açık, Rütbeniz global olsun:) sağlıcakla.
